item.title: How to prepare yourself to be better at Data Interviews?
item.description: How to prepare yourself to be better at Data Interviews? In this blog, letâ€™s talk about some specific actions you can take to perform better at Data Interviews. Below is general advice based on my experience coaching 100+ candidates and my industry experience being on both sides of the table. Popular skill set as of 2023 still seems to be SQL, Python & Big Data fundamentals. Here is how to prepare for each of them.
